name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kuration AI extension: LinkedIn leads exporter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kuration AI extension: LinkedIn leads exporter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export leads and accounts from LinkedIn to Kuration, the first step of your AI-powered enrichment process

Scraping is step one. Kuration AI takes your Sales Navigator lists further:

1️⃣ Qualify Leads Instantly
Use conventional data points or your own custom enrichment using AI, e.g Gender, Remote work policy, business mode, etc

2️⃣ Enrich with 100+ Data Sources
Get detailed profiles enriched with data from websites, news, google maps, and premium sources such as Pitchbook, Crunchbase, Apollo, etc

3️⃣ Clean, Ready-to-Use Lists
Export formatted, deduplicated, and enriched lists directly to your CRM or CSV—no extra cleanup needed.

4️⃣ Automate Research
Answer key questions like “Which startups in Europe are remote-first?” or “What companies in Asia are hiring for partnerships?”

With Kuration AI, scraping is just the beginning. Build smarter lists, faster, and focus your time on closing deals.
